==== Test remarks ====
===== snr-001 Suspend/Resume smoke test =====
* very first suspend test did not work. Machine did not suspend.<<BR>>
* manual resume was needed at every suspend.<<BR>>
* at the end of the stress-test the cursor disappeared but didn't freeze, then magically came back.

===== snr-003 Hibernate/Resume smoke test =====
* resuming from hibernation results in a complete freeze with the Caps-lock light blinking (kernel panic).<<BR>>
 A hard reboot is necessary.
